Brandon.about: Write your about me blurb here.

Emily.about: Hi! I'm Emily! While I may be terrible at writing blurbs about myself, I'm great at learning new things and making stuff work on a tight deadline! I've been programming for almost ten years now and am excited to apply my skills towards working in a production environment.
Emily.education: Software Engineering at Ontario Tech University

work experience.title: Software Developer Co-Op
work experience.description: 4-month internship, developed internal tooling and processes for automating reporting

work experience.title: Software Developer Co-Op
work experience.description: 8-month internship, developed prototypes for internal tools

work experience.title: Innovation Developer
work experience.description: 2-month internship, worked on performance review tool for co-op students

hobbies.title: Flying
hobbies.description: I have my pilot's license and frequently rent a plane to go flying. My favorite place to go is above Toronto - I get a view of the city not many others get to experience!

hobbies.title: Skiing
hobbies.description: In the winter I love to stay active by going cross-country skiing. It's a great workout and it's rewarding to see myself improve and get faster!
